short_summary: Plumbing Maintenance & Repair Services at the Pacific Biological Station.
description: The requirement is for providing plumbing and water heating maintenance and installation services for the Department of Fisheries and Oceans at the Pacific Biological Station, Nanaimo, B.C.
full_summary:
### Plumbing Maintenance & Repair Services at the Pacific Biological Station

#### Request for Standing Offer (RFSO)

**Reference Number:** 30004465A
**Publication Date:** January 29, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** February 13, 2024, 14:00:00 EST

#### Overview

Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO) invites qualified contractors to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) for Plumbing Maintenance & Repair Services at the Pacific Biological Station, located in Nanaimo, British Columbia.

**Scope of Work**

The successful Standing Offer (SO) provider will be responsible for providing plumbing and water heating maintenance and installation services to DFO at the Pacific Biological Station. The Services will be furnished on an "as and when requested" basis.

The successful provider will be required to perform a range of tasks, including:

* Repair and installation of commercial and industrial plumbing equipment
* Maintenance and inspection of glycol systems
* Verification of boiler operation and safety devices
* Installation and inspection of backflow preventers
* Inspection and installation of piping and plumbing fixtures
* Repair and maintenance of plumbing, including the replacement of defective washers and broken pipes

**Comprehensive Land Claims Agreement**

The Standing Offer (SO) is for the delivery of the requirement detailed in the SO to the Identified Users across Canada, excluding locations within Yukon, Northwest Territories, Nunavut, Quebec, and Labrador that are subject to Comprehensive Land Claims Agreements (CLCAs).

**Trade Agreements**

The requirement is subject to the Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization-Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada - Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada - European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, the Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Period of Standing Offer**

The contract will be awarded for a period of 5 years (60 months) from the date of award.

**Security Requirement**

This solicitation contains a security requirement.

**Contact Information**

For any further information regarding this solicitation, please email: DFO.tenders-soumissions.MPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca or
